snippet: A 19-year-old man was killed when a model helicopter that he was piloting in Calvert Vaux Park struck him in the head, the authorities said.
abstract: Roman Pirozek Jr dies after being hit in head with remote-controlled helicopter he was piloting in Calvert Vaux Park, Brooklyn; police are interviewing witnesses in an attempt to determine cause of accident.

byline.contributor: Eli Rosenberg and Ravi Somaiya contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A 19-year-old man was killed when a model helicopter that he was piloting in Calvert Vaux Park struck him in the head, the authorities said.

headline.main: Remote-Controlled Model Helicopter Fatally Strikes Its Operator
headline.print_headline: Remote-Controlled Model Helicopter Fatally Strikes Its Operator at a Brooklyn Park
